text.content: In the eye of the storm  Looking out through the rain  Gabriel, blow your horn  They shield me from tsunamis and the hurricane    [Chorus]  Catch the right ride in the nick of time  Soldiers stay affronted then they blow your mind  Bold ass soldiers marching off to war  No idea what we're in for  Powerful, magnificent and so divine  Soldiers stay affronted it'll blow your mind    Hear a thunderous voice  Shouting there will be no peace  Until our people rejoice  When every boy and girl is freed  You see it's going down  The wars and the mysteries  But my friends, there'll be better days  And a better way  According to the prophecy    [Bridge]  It would be so nice  To look up at paradise  By all means we must go  Or are you in the know  Like all the way up, so child,    You been a friend of mine    [Chorus]    You been a friend of mine    [Bridge]
